III.i.1.C.1.b
.
Listing of Approved Groups Under PL 106-259
Effective August 9, 2000,
PL 106-259
established Veteran status for individuals who participated in the Alaska Territorial Guard (ATG) during WWII and who were honorably discharged from service.
Notes
:
AK-DMVA Form ATG-214
must
be completed for individuals
seeking to establish ATG status, and/or
requesting an official copy of his/her Transcript of Military Records.
To obtain a copy of
AK-DMVA Form ATG-214
, send a request to:
Department of Military and Veterans Affairs
Office of the Adjutant General
P.O. Box 5800
Fort Richardson, Alaska 99505-6003
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C - Civilian GroupsÂ Approved for Veteran Status
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C
